name: Browser Usage Protocol
description: MANDATORY steps before ANY browser action

steps.label: CHECK OPEN TABS
steps.description: List all open tabs before doing anything

steps.label: CHECK FOR DUPLICATE DOMAIN
steps.description: Is there already a tab for this domain? If yes, USE IT. Already has login session. Don't open new.

steps.label: NAVIGATE OR REUSE
steps.description: Use existing tab and navigate within it. Only open new if domain not open.

steps.label: CLOSE WHEN DONE
steps.description: Close tab immediately when finished with that site
